website_summaries.verdict: If you want the biggest and most stable hoop but need flexibility on height adjustment, this choice is tough to beat.
pros: 60-inch backboard is as close to a pro set-up as you'll find in a portable hoop
Made of 1/4-inch thick tempered glass w/a steel and aluminum surround
cons: Expensive, but you are paying for a top-of-the-line hoop

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend ... go 60 not 52.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. My friend who helped install is buying one because of how sturdy it is. No wobble on the 60". I did a 2x2x2.5 hole (17 80lb bags). Concrete was most "difficult" but really just rough work mixing. The posts, etc were all easy. Great instructions. For backboard have a truck. We backed up to the post with it cranked down. Two of us lifted up to truck and lifted up the 12" higher while the wife slid the large bolts in. Go 60" not 52" ... it's a much better playing experience.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Was excited....
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because the hoop covers dunking and hanging and there was a deal for a free install. Amazon did not have anyone in the area to install the hoop so i had to cancel the order.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The structure and quality of this product is awesome. I've got nothing bad to say at all
customer_reviews.text: The structure and quality of this product is awesome. I've got nothing bad to say at all. It's well worth the money and is great for our whole family.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brockette

customer_reviews.title: Hoop is downright indestructible. 3 grade school kids can ...
customer_reviews.text: Hoop is downright indestructible. 3 grade school kids can hang from it and not even remotely move it. Height adjustments don’t seem to be very accurate, but overall it’s a beast.
customer_reviews.author: Dk

customer_reviews.title: Legit basketball system!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Easy to assemble if you’re not afraid of a little grunt work to prep the foundation. Kids love it! It’s a legit basketball system!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hoop
customer_reviews.text: We put the hoop in our back yard court and everything has gone great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A well built product
customer_reviews.text: We put this in at the church for youth to play on
customer_reviews.author: David C. Huskamp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and a quality product. I'm very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Eric Klopfenstein

customer_reviews.title: Best hoop set ever!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old was so excited to get this and have it setup. He says it's the best hoop in the whole neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This hoop is a very sturdy and well made system that he just loves to ...
customer_reviews.text: A few years back we bought our son a free standing hoop and he occasionally would play with it. Since the end of last year he really became interested in basketball and made the school middle school basketball team. Each day he would go out and play whenever he had the chance. So for his b-day this year we decided to put in a permanent one that he could use throughout his teenage years. This hoop is a very sturdy and well made system that he just loves to play with. Thank you for making a great product that keeps our son outside and active.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great goal! Its sturdy and setup professionally.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with my basketball goal. It was installed on time, professionally, and looks great. Our goal is setup perfectly with no issues. I check the leveler and measured the height, and everything is perfect. The goal is sturdy and durable. We are very happy with our purchase and installation experience. I will recommend to all my family and friends. Thank you Pro Dunk Hoops!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Great goal for kids to grow into.
customer_reviews.text: Goal is awesome I can lower it and dunk then raise it back up for normal play. My kids don’t play on 10ft so works perfect until they grow into it. Materials are top of the line. Backboard doesn’t wobble like a water filled basketball goal when you shoot. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a long lasting great quality basketball goal. Oh and also the guys installing the goal were great. Put it right where we wanted to and did a professional job. Would purchase again if we move.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Boulanger

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, plays great. Kids love it. The biggest issue I have had with putting up a goal outside my house was the optics, but this thing looks amazing. I can't keep the kids inside, and the neighbors have come over and asked where I got it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: My kids (13-20yrs) have been using this system for ~16 months now and it has been perfect. Allows for the kids to work on their game alone or abuse it with their friends and no damage to the overall system. All was great until a Fedex truck backed into the rim yesterday. It totally destroyed the rim and bent the arm system so the backboard is no longer square with the post. Backboard is still intact and raises and lowers fine and the main post was unaffected. This is a beast of a system that took a beating and will be repaired to hopefully provide years of additional service.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was heavy duty and sturdy. It was packaged very well. And delivered quickly. The post and back broad are very very heavy. It will take at least three adults 4 would be better. We watched a video and it said to use the bed of a truck to get the back broad on to the pole. That really help because you were steady. Ladders would have made it very hard because of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Corley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Produnk purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and items arrived via freight on a pallet. Everything was packed very well and there was no damage on delivery. The basketball goal is very stable, looks great, and easily raises and lowers for my 8 y/o. It’s very high quality and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The gold hoop is solid! Me and my kids have used it everyday. We shoot long shots with almost no vibration. I love the quality and sturdiness of the system. Either a 12,4 and 2 year old, I can appreciate how much use we will get out of it over the years. The kids also like how it goes down to 5 feet. Fun times for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hofer

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Hours of family fun and great exercise. Neighbors comment on how nice the goal looks. The rim vibrates just a little, but this is definitely a quality system. Staff is friendly and available to answer any questions you may have. They also have plenty of video’s online to help answer your questions. Definitely recommend the Gold Basketball Goal. Ron. Fayetteville, Ga
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and well built piece of equipment. I picked up two of them to run full court and I am stoked!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Barta

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the cheaper brands, this one is solid!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to lower and raise if you have kids of multiple ages. Extremely high quality construction, very sturdy! Our HOA allowed us to install it due to the professional installation.
customer_reviews.author: Very Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the Reviews! This hoop is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This hoop was recommended by a friend and has been everything we could have asked for. The installation was simple and quick. The hoop is of great quality. Very little movement when the ball makes contact with hoop. Very easy to move from 10 feet to 5 feet. Fun for everyone in the family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid hoop
customer_reviews.text: Solid hoop with virtually no vibration on the rim and backboard when we’re shooting... that was a huge issue with our last hoop so very happy with this purchase so far! We paid for installation so can’t comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: If you're serious about Basketball...Then this is the system for your family
customer_reviews.text: Holy Cow!!! Great System...Very easy to put together w/online video instructions and reachable phone support. Yes, Im a little too old to be digging such a large hole; but, it was great bonding time with the kids. Im glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SeltzerWorks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old loves the goal...much nicer than the portable we replaced. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality all around and both company and local installer were easy to work with. A small misstep with order was quickly recognized and corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Maccers7

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and great basketball goal!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product and customer Incredible customer service, lightening fast delivery, incredible products!!
customer_reviews.author: terry turner

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor basketball system
customer_reviews.text: Great product and better than I had hoped- I teach basketball shooting all over the country so I need to stay in shooting shape- this is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Coach Barry Brodzinski

customer_reviews.title: Great family hoop!
customer_reviews.text: This basketball hoop has been excellent for our family and neighbors! It get used all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Steines

customer_reviews.title: Well built product, heavy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very easy to adjust the height. Great home recreation for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kinzer

customer_reviews.title: Great system! Very solid but yet so easy for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great system! Very solid but yet so easy for the kids to adjust the height.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McRae

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for our family
customer_reviews.text: This goal is very well made and gives gym like performance.
customer_reviews.author: hoopsfan

customer_reviews.title: Best CHRISTMAS GIFTS EVER.
customer_reviews.text: My kids and neighbors love the Basketball Goal. We have nothing but good things to say about this product. Easy to operate, and easy to clean. Thank you so much for the future enjoyment for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Family Home Builders LLC

customer_reviews.title: Number 1 hoop brand in the market recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Gold pro dunk hoop. Kids love the hoop and are having lots of fun including myself. Great quality as advertised, if you are in the market of buying hoop, you are picking the best hoop in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Basketball System!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile goal....will adjust down to where my 6 year old daughter can shoot and up to where my 9 year old daughter can play. My friends have goals bought at the big box sporting stores and when they come over and see mine they wish they had purchased a Pro Dunk System. I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: The basketball goal has worked perfectly. The kids adjust it up and down themselves depending on who is using it. My younger boys lower it down for dunking and fun, and my high school kids put it up at 10 feet for working on their skills. Everything has been solid and works great. We erected it about 8 months ago and it has been used almost every day since (except on rainy or snowy ones). I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Rex M. Branstetter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Goal
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it goes down so low that my young children can play, but is sturdy enough that my buddies and I can get out and play on it as well as dunk on it and it hold up. the only negative i have is that the rim is the most unforgiving rim I've ever played on. I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Ray Butts

product_meta.title: Pro Dunk Gold Driveway Basketball Goal Hoop with a High-Performance 60 Inch Glass Backboard That Can Be Effortlessly Adjusted Down to an Industry Low 5 Feet
product_meta.description:
The in-ground, height-adjustable pro dunk gold basketball hoop is our most popular driveway basketball system. It has a high-performance 60 inch tempered glass backboard and a powerful lift-assist mechanism allowing the youngest competitors to easily lower the system all the way down to an industry low 5 feet. The backboard is attached to a durable, rigid 6 inch square (7 gauge thick) one piece pole. It comes with a heavy-duty rim with internal dual spring back mechanism that delivers gym-quality play. The basketball goal system is precisely constructed with the highest quality materials and is backed with our legendary limited lifetime warranty that covers all basketball play. If you're looking for the perfect basketball goal hoop for your home driveway then look no further. Turn your driveway into a fun family basketball court with the pro dunk gold basketball hoop today.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  Installation manual [PDF ] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :96 x 36 x 24 inches; 470 Pounds
 * Item model number :PDG
 * Department :Unisex-child
 * Date First Available :December 30, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Pro Dunk Hoops
 * ASIN :B00RM5UMW2

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars53 ratings The in-ground, height-adjustable pro dunk gold basketball hoop is our most popular driveway basketball system. It has a high-performance 60 inch tempered glass backboard and a powerful lift-assist mechanism allowing the youngest competitors to easily lower the system all the way down to an industry low 5 feet. The backboard is attached to a durable, rigid 6 inch square (7 gauge thick) one piece pole. It comes with a heavy-duty rim with internal dual spring back mechanism that delivers gym-quality play. The basketball goal system is precisely constructed with the highest quality materials and is backed with our legendary limited lifetime warranty that covers all basketball play. If you're looking for the perfect basketball goal hoop for your home driveway then look no further. Turn your driveway into a fun family basketball court with the pro dunk gold basketball hoop today.
feature_bullets: High-performance gym-quality adjustable in-ground 60 inch tempered glass backboard (full 1/2 inch thick)
Massive 6x6 inch one-piece pole for rock solid play
Covers all basketball play including dunking and hanging and infinitely adjustable between 5 and 10 feet with effortless turn of a handle
Complete padding set - 1 inch thick high impact outdoor safety backboard, pole and gusset padding included
With the rust armor package (including: stainless steel hardware, entire system zinc galvanized and extended corrosion)
